// https://www.w3.org/Graphics/JPEG/itu-t81.pdf
// pdftotext
// %s/[01]\+$/\=printf("0x%04x %s", str2nr(submatch(0),2), submatch(0))

Table K.3 - Table for luminance DC coefficients

Category Code length Code word
 0 2 0x0000 00
 1 3 0x0002 010
 2 3 0x0003 011
 3 3 0x0004 100
 4 3 0x0005 101
 5 3 0x0006 110
 6 4 0x000e 1110
 7 5 0x001e 11110
 8 6 0x003e 111110
 9 7 0x007e 1111110
10 8 0x00fe 11111110
11 9 0x01fe 111111110

Table K.4 – Table for chrominance DC coefficient differences

Category Code length Code word
 0  2 0x0000 00
 1  2 0x0001 01
 2  2 0x0002 10
 3  3 0x0006 110
 4  4 0x000e 1110
 5  5 0x001e 11110
 6  6 0x003e 111110
 7  7 0x007e 1111110
 8  8 0x00fe 11111110
 9  9 0x01fe 111111110
10 10 0x03fe 1111111110
11 11 0x07fe 11111111110

Table K.5 – Table for luminance AC coefficients (sheet 1 of 4)
